Title: Shin Tenchi Muyou! Specials
Description: ['Omakes of Tenchi in Tokyo that were sold on the Laserdiscs in Japan.  Contains 3 stories, each in two parts.']
Characters: ['Hakubi, Ryouko', 'Kumashiro, Sakuya', 'Masaki, Tenchi', 'Ryou-Ouki', 'Masaki, Sasami Jurai', 'Kuramitsu, Mihoshi', 'Makibi, Kiyone']
